name: marathon-lb
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of 0.5 CPUs and 256 MB of RAM available for the Marathon-LB DCOS Service.
postInstallNotes:
Mesosphere-LB DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
See https://github.com/mesosphere/marathon-lb for documentation.
postUninstallNotes: Mesosphere-LB DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
